website_summaries.verdict: We love the intricate wrought-iron-style design on this highly affordable wallpaper.
pros: You can choose to either leave it white or paint it
Since it's made from vinyl, you can easily wash it, and it will strip right off when you want to remove it
cons: Can be tricky to work with when wet from wallpaper paste

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and beautiful kitchen backsplash and bathroom ceiling!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to put on our bathroom ceiling because I didn't feel like retexturing or painting after I removed the popcorn ceiling. It's subtle yet beautiful. It elevates the bathroom's appearance. It's been up for a couple months and I haven't noticed any effect of the humidity from the shower. I always turn on the vent and open the door after showering to let out the steam anyways. Originally I was going to do a tile backsplash in the kitchen, but that turned out to be out of my budget. I had leftover wallpaper from the bathroom ceiling so I decided to use that as a backsplash. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Turned out really nice. The paper is pretty and you can see ...
customer_reviews.text: I was going to paint this a light gray but I ended up loving it so much just the way it was! I put this paper on the face of a hallway set of drawers and bought crystal pulls. Turned out really nice. The paper is pretty and you can see the embossed detail from several feet back. I did practice painting one piece and it looked nice. . took the paint well but liked the white better. It was a lot of paper for only a few drawer faces, but I plan on using it again with other projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always measure correctly, know what your doing...
customer_reviews.text: Put on wall above my shower. Because of the material it’s made of I know the humidity will not hurt it. Plus it wasn’t prepasted which that is what I wanted. Dont use prepasted where you’ll have problems with humidity...in time will start falling..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my bedroom. I hand painted over it so the texture shows even better through the uneven paint. Everyone compliments me on the room. I used a rich leafy green color with ivory curtains and blankets; wood wardrobe, bed-frame etc. It was easy to match the pattern, but I didn't give it 5 stars because I had to order one more role to finish, and it was not cut the same. Be sure to order plenty and perhaps return the extra so the same doesn't happen to you. A roll doesn't go very far.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful result!!! Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the result of using this as a stair riser decor!! I do recommend that with this type of use to paint over it to preserve the pattern, even if staying white. If not kicking the stair riser with your toes can wear down the pattern. Love the outcome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helle Bockman

customer_reviews.title: This paper doesn't look too bad but it is not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This paper doesn't look too bad but it is not what I was expecting. It is not as embossed as I wanted and it tears really easily when it is wet. Of course it is wet when you put paste on it. I used really sharp blades and changed constantly but it still wanted to tear. I thought being vinyl it would be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Lot of hassel
customer_reviews.text: Let it be known before, this was our first experience ever with wallpaper. So we had no idea what we were getting into, dont let our experience turn you away. The seams were pretty hard to line up, my husband spent an hour in our bathroom trying to get it all perfect and gave up. Once we painted it it began to get random huge bubbles and we panicked. Don't worry those go away once the paint dries. Love the look but so much hassel
customer_reviews.author: Becca tyler

customer_reviews.title: This is nice wallpaper, kind of delicate
customer_reviews.text: This is nice wallpaper, kind of delicate, hang with care. Little bummed cause they charged me 7.48 to return one roll.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL but a little difficult to install!
customer_reviews.text: After I figured out how to install it ( never put up wallpaper before) it wasn’t too bad!! Pattern was easy to match BUT I gave 4 stars because it does tear easy when you try to cut away excess. I let it dry for awhile before I used the razor blade (which was new and sharp) to cut after it was applied and that seemed to work best - cutting right after it was applied made awful tears. It is absolutely beautiful though! I plan to paint it in a day or two, but it looks good enough to leave as is :)
customer_reviews.author: Lea Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallpaper. So pretty. Didn’t need much of it so used extra in art projects. I suggest painting it even if staying white. Tends to gets smudges easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Still putting it up, but seems to be a great product. It will tear kind of easily, but I put it on, removed it to adjust and having no problems. Much better than I expected. Pattern is pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Paper
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many compliments on this paper. It looks so different with each technique I have used in it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest wallpaper I ever used. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: chytr

customer_reviews.title: beautiful & elegant
customer_reviews.text: So I should start this off by saying that I have never installed wallpaper before, and I figured this out pretty easily on my own. Definitely go to Home Depot and get wallpaper adhesive. Definitely let fully dry before cutting, it tears very easily. But it’s absolutely gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: The paint (basic satin) highlighted the raised portions very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I placed this paper on a ceiling and an alcove. The paint (basic satin) highlighted the raised portions very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget to use wallpaper paste! Very nice paper. I painted it, turned out awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: Brewster’s paper excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A quality heavy textured paper that hid imperfections in old plaster
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to cabinet doors for a more textured look and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this wallpaper! It feels great too! Does take time and patience to install
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Went up easily and painted beautifully. I’ve gotten so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Tamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this paper on the front of another chest of drawers that I'll be starting soon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Transformed a beaten up, but classic piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Used this wallpaper on a piece of furniture I was restoring. Worked beautifully and painted like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: refacing a chest of drawers
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to redo a chest. It is pine and has knots. The wallpaper will reface the front of the drawers and then paint like rest of chest.
customer_reviews.author: Shaker 48n

customer_reviews.title: I love the design on this wallpaper
customer_reviews.text: I love the design on this wallpaper. It was easier to hang then I thought and painted it was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: crsticar@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: it's a beast to apply but once applied it's beautiful. I used regular wallpaper adhesive. I usually paint this type of wallpaper but I left this one white as I was hanging mirrors over it.
customer_reviews.author: fam

customer_reviews.title: tears easily
customer_reviews.text: looks nice once on and painted, but tears so easily, its impossible to cut with a razor knife once on the wall. I had to measure exactly and cut it before wetting it. wish I knew how large the design squares were they were too big for my area, and ended up being cut at an odd place in the design would have been better if they were smaller. not good for a backsplash, but ok for a large wall area
customer_reviews.author: jabberwockie

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the pattern would be a little deeper, but was otherwise pleased. Application was easy enough because the pattern was regular.
customer_reviews.author: EC

product_meta.title: Brewster RD0671 Anaglypta Iron-Like Paintable Wrought Wallpaper, 21-Inch by 396-Inch, White
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This is "Paintable Wallpaper". Transform any wall or ceiling from ordinary to fabulous with character and dimension. Replicate the look of authentic tin ceiling, carved wood or a plaster frieze with a wonderful selection of historically inspired or contemporary designs. Pick your style and finish with any paint color or faux technique to create your own masterpiece. Sold as one "double roll" bolt; equal to two continuous single rolls.
feature_bullets: This wallpaper is printed on expanded vinyl
21-Inch wide by 396-Inch long; approximately 50 useable sq ft in a continuous "double roll" bolt
This wallpaper is washable and strippable
This wallpaper is printed on expanded vinyl and this wallpaper is unpasted
Double roll" bolt; equal to two continuous single rolls
21-Inch wide by 396-Inch long; approximately 50 useable sq ft in a continuous "double roll" bolt
This wallpaper is washable and strippable
